title: Full Floor Flat - 3BR/2BA! LAUNDRY! DISHWASHER! SHARED BACKYARD!
posting_body: ['Full Floor Flat - 3BR/2BA!', 'LAUNDRY!', 'DISHWASHER!', 'SHARED BACKYARD!', 'Property Address', '1438 Waller St. | San Francisco, CA 94117', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'Sutro Property Management Inc.', '|', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'EXTRA LARGE and updated 3BR/2BA in the heart of beautiful Haight-Ashbury.', 'This flat features in-unit laundry, wonderful cabinet space, recessed lighting, and a tile backsplash.', 'Architecturally stunning, this unit boasts sunlight soaked bay windows, ceiling beams, wainscoting, two remodeled decorative fireplaces, and crown molding.', 'Located in the heart of Haight/ Ashbury, this classic Victorian flat is a central and convenient location to shops, restaurants, and Golden Gate Park.', 'ADDITIONAL AMENITIES', '•
